import sys


input = sys.stdin.readlines()[1:]

for str in input:
    jewels = {}

    for c in str.strip():
        if c in jewels:
            jewels[c] += 1
        else:
            jewels[c] = 1

    buy = 0

    for v in jewels.values():
        q, r = divmod(v, 2)
        buy += q + r

    print buy
